release_notes:
• Add Investment Performance chart (gains only, excludes deposits)
• Fix double-counting of deposits in account balance
• Fix data persistence and add pull-to-refresh with price updates
• Fix cash balance and USD profit calculation
• Bump version to 2.16.6+41
• Temporarily disable iOS build in CI
• Fix compilation errors in Account.csv import
• Fix buy/sell detection and add duplicate account cleanup
• Fix Account.csv import to create assets from buy/sell history
• Add Performance Breakdown screen for return verification
